title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Install with pip install ollama and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer that exposes Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface). Runs in Docker, supports multi-user, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline autocomplete.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings and Chroma/Qdrant vector stores. Ready-to-run FastAPI server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility and reactive (RxJava) wrappers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate exposing async/await APIs for chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with chat, embeddings, and tool-calling abstractions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in channels or DMs with rate-limit and admin controls.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any Ollama model for summarizing notes and brainstorming.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code explanation, generation, and refactoring using Ollama models via Lua APIs.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver extension that adds SQL autocomplete and natural-language → SQL via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat template that deploys a Gradio-like UI for Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile library: quantized Llama, CodeLlama, Falcon, Zephyr, and fine-tunes ready to pull.
